contentencoded: Twitter's stock closed yesterday at a level that's almost triple its IPO price. Twitter's IPO was one of the biggest tech events of the year, and tt's been a very hot 12 months for tech all around. Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson previews what's on deck for tech in 2014, including the idea that your TV and washing machine might be networked to one another -- a concept called "the internet of things."
teaser: Twitter's IPO was one of the biggest tech events of 2013. What's in store for 2014?
title: What will happen in tech in 2014?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 27, 2013
